title: ISic002837. I.Sicily inscription 002837
body:
1Ζωδίκα
2χρηστὰ{ια}
3χαῖρε{αι}

1ΖΩΔΙΚΑ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΑΙΑ
3ΧΑΙΡΕΑΙ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Meligunìs Lipára XII
  • 2-3: Bernabò Brea - Cavalier: ΧΡΗCΤΑ ΙΑ ΧΑΙΡΕ ΑΙ. They note that the final two letters of lines 2 and 3 are different and much more uncertain writing, probably a trace of a previous erasure;
  • SEG: ΧΡΗΣΤΑ ΧΑΙΡΕ

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • 45.1381.68 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 411 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
  • Bernabò Brea and Cavalier 1994 no.68 pl.129 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002156
